table_caption: Change in DTI measures in each cohort studies. There were significant changes in all measures in all cohorts except for PRESERVE and CADASIL. In PRESERVE there was a significant change DSEG and MD Median but not for PSMD and Geff. In CADASIL there was only a marginally significant change for Geff.
table_foot: MD Median = mean diffusivity median of the WM histogram, PC1 = scores of the first principal component, PSMD = peak width of skeletonized mean diffusivity, DSEG θ = diffusion tensor image segmentation θ, Geff = global efficiency network measure.P-Value = statistical value of significance with p < 0.05.
